Package possystem

Class Order

java.lang.Object
possystem.Order
public class Order extends Object
An order is created to record all the dishes that a customer ordered. When the order invoice is printed, the order is paid, the order status is inactive.
Since:
2021-11-08
Version:
1.0
Author:
xiongying
